headline: Key Takeaways From Trump’s Tax Returns
snippet: Former President Donald J. Trump, who fought for years to keep his returns private, made no charitable donations in 2020, and his own tax law may have cost him. Here’s a running list of insights.
abstract: Former President Donald J. Trump, who fought for years to keep his returns private, made no charitable donations in 2020, and his own tax law may have cost him. Here’s a running list of insights.
byline: By Jim Tankersley, Susanne Craig and Russ Buettner

headline: Trump Tax Returns Undermine His Image as a Successful Entrepreneur
snippet: The release of former President Donald J. Trump’s private tax documents by the House Ways and Means Committee shows heavy losses from his own ventures as he continued to cash in on inherited assets.
abstract: The release of former President Donald J. Trump’s private tax documents by the House Ways and Means Committee shows heavy losses from his own ventures as he continued to cash in on inherited assets.
byline: By Jim Tankersley, Susanne Craig and Russ Buettner

headline: After Half a Century, Fauci Prepares for Life After Government
snippet: The nation’s top infectious disease expert, whose last day as a federal employee is Saturday, plans to write a memoir and wants to encourage people to go into public service.
